Intervention: Exemestane 25 milligrams (mg) oral tablet once daily
One 160 mg tablet of megestrol acetate is taken once daily.
Eligibility: Topics that had not previously participated in study 971-ONC-0028-080.
Results: Overall survival in months, measured from the start date of treatment in the baseline study to the date of death, regardless of the reason.
Time limit: Every 12 weeks up to 6 years
Description of the arm/group: Exemestane 25 milligrams (mg) oral tablet taken once daily
Title of the arm/group: Acetate of Megestrol
Description of the arm/group: Megestrol acetate 160 mg tablet once daily
